alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 10:12PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Madison and northeastern Limestone Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1012 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harvest, or 10 miles northeast of Athens, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Alabama A And M University, University Of Alabama In Huntsville, Harvest, Maysville, Toney and Ryland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
